## PoiTable.(constructor)

Creates an instance of PoiTable.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(name: string, useAltNamesForKey: boolean);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | Name of the <code>PoiTable</code>. Must be unique. |
|  useAltNamesForKey | boolean | Pass <code>true</code> to use the contents of the property <code>altNames</code> to find a \[\[PoiTableEntry\]\] in the table. |
